titleStmt.title: The historie of Adam, or the foure-fold state of man, vvell formed in his creation, deformed in his corruption, reformed in Grace, and perfected in glory. By Mr. Henry Holland, late preacher at Saint Brides Church in London
titleStmt.author: Holland, Henry, 1555 or 6-1603.
Topsell, Edward, 1572-1625?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] E[ast] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Paternoster-Row at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Edited and completed by Edward Topsell, who signs the dedication.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paternoster-Row at the signe of the Talbot
